name: suzette stitch pumpkin
sizes_available: small – 11” x 2”, medium – 13” x 2.5”, large – 15.5” x 3”
notes:
this beautifully textured pumpkin pattern makes a gorgeous home decor essential for autumn/fall. 

it features the pretty suzette stitch (also called grit or thicket stitch), an easy textured stitch that is both lovely to look at and creates a cozy feel. 

finish with a cinnamon stick or twig for a touch of rustic charm.

the pattern is written in three sizes, with **size small free on the blog**, written using us crochet terminology. the paid pdf  includes both us and uk terminology versions in 2 files for your convenience.

**skill level:** easy

**recommended yarn**
aran or worsted #4 weight acrylic/wool/blend yarn approximately 
s – 42-47yards/38-43m (0.8-0.9oz/22-25g)  
m – 63-71yards/58-65m (1.2-1.3oz/34-38g) 
l – 82-91yards/75-83m (1.6-1.7oz/44-49g)
you can use any yarn. it is a great pattern for scraps. you may need to adjust your hook size accordingly and size will vary with different weight yarn.

**hooks & other materials**
• us size h (5.0mm)
• yarn needle
• stitch marker
• toy stuffing
• cinnamon sticks or twigs

**sizes/finished measurements**
not including stick, approximate finished sizes (circumference x height): small – 11” x 2”/28cm x 5cm. medium – 13” x 2.5”/33cm x 6cm. large – 15.5” x 3”/39cm x 8cm.

this pattern has been tested for errors, but should you have any problems, please send me a message through ravelry or email.

**the finished pumpkins are designed for decorative use only.** they are **not toys** and **finished items should be kept out of the reach of children.**
